entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:04 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
